game.name: Schedule I
game.genres: Action, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: From small-time dope pusher to kingpin - manufacture and distribute a range of drugs throughout the grungy city of Hyland Point. Expand your empire with properties, businesses, employees and more.
game.shortDescriptionEn: From small-time dope pusher to kingpin - manufacture and distribute a range of drugs throughout the grungy city of Hyland Point. Expand your empire with properties, businesses, employees and more.

reviewHighlights.text: Very chill game about growing plants and mushrooms, not sure why the police get so upset with me? I'm just a humble gardener.
I enjoy planting and taking care of them just to do weird experimental combo's and have fun by watching people take those drugs to ruin themselves. I...
